bill.title: Relating To Wages.
bill.description: Makes general contractors entering into or under contracts in the State for work on buildings, structures, or other private works liable for debt incurred by subcontractors for wages due to claimants for performance of labor in the contract between the general contractor and owner. (SB1082 HD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to LCA/CPH, JDC.
Re-Referred to LCA, JDC.
The committee(s) on LCA has scheduled a public hearing on 02-12-19 3:40PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on LCA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in LCA were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Ihara, Gabbard, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) S. Chang.
Reported from LCA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 455) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDC.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC will hold a public decision making on 02-26-19 9:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Rhoads, Wakai, Gabbard, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1040) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-05-19.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Harimoto). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 364) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, JUD, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Thursday, 03-14-19 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Eli, Ichiyama, Kitagawa, McKelvey, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Quinlan.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1546) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with Representative(s) San Buenaventura, Thielen voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cabanilla Arakawa, Holt, Tokioka, Yamane excused (5).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Wednesday, 03-27-19 2:05PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 03-29-19 at 2:00PM.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Friday, 03-29-19 2:00PM in conference room 325.
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 04-02-19 at 2:00pm.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 04-02-19 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, San Buenaventura, Brower, Creagan, Lowen, McKelvey, Morikawa, Say, Takayama; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Yamane.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2203) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-09-19.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Okimoto voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Thielen, Ward voting no (2) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 771).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 893).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Taniguchi Chair; K. Rhoads Co-Chair; Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 901).
